title: Ironwood: Google's Answer to Nvidia in the AI Chip Wars
author: Agam Shah
description: Google's new Ironwood TPU powers AI Hypercomputers with 42.5 exaflops of performance—24 times faster than the world's top supercomputer.
cntitle: Ironwood：谷歌在 AI 芯片大战中对抗英伟达的答案
cndescription: 谷歌新型 Ironwood TPU 为 AI 超级计算机提供动力，性能高达 42.5 exaflops，比世界顶级超级计算机快 24 倍。
